item.title: How to Download Caste Certificate Online
item.description: How to Download Caste Certificate Online From Birth to Death! Government Documents / Services - Guidebook A caste certificate is a certificate issued by the Revenue Department stating that the person belongs to a specific caste listed in the Tamil Nadu Caste List. This certificate is used for student admissions in schools and in some other places. Earlier, this certificate could be obtained through an application available at the District Collector’s office.
